trans-unit.source: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip? Our Around the World in 80 Days travel package is specifically designed for this.

seg-source.mrk: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip?
Our Around the World in 80 Days travel package is specifically designed for this.

alt-trans.source: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip?
alt-trans.target: N’avez-vous jamais rêvé de marcher sur les six continents, en un seul voyage magnifique autour de la planète ?

alt-trans.source: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip?
alt-trans.target: N’avez-vous jamais rêvé de marcher sur les six continents, en un seul voyage magnifique autour de la planète ?

alt-trans.source: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip?
alt-trans.target: Avez-vous jamais rêvé de marcher sur chacun des cinq continents de la planète au cours d'un seul voyage extraordinaire?

alt-trans.source: Our Around the World in 80 Days travel package is specifically designed for this.
alt-trans.target: Notre tour du monde en 80 jours de voyage paquet est spécifiquement conçu pour cela.

trans-unit.source: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet. In 80 days, you will see more of the world than most see through their entire lifetime! You will come back with the rich experience that nothing but a true journey can provide.

seg-source.mrk: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet.
In 80 days, you will see more of the world than most see through their entire lifetime!

alt-trans.source: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet.
alt-trans.target: Des canyons de l’Arizona, aux temples Khmers enfouis dans la jungle; des plages tropicales du Queensland aux glaciers d’Antarctique; ou de la savane africaine aux mystérieux château au cœur des forets de Bohême, notre offre vous amène aux endroits les plus incroyables de notre planète.

alt-trans.source: In 80 days, you will see more of the world than most see through their entire lifetime!
alt-trans.target: En 80 jours, vous verrez plus du monde que la plupart voient dans l’espace de leur vie!

alt-trans.source: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet.
alt-trans.target: Depuis les canyons de l'Arizona, aux temples khmers profondes dans la jungle ; des plages tropicales du Queensland pour les glaciers de L'Antarctique ; ou de la savane sauvage d'Afrique à Châteaux mystérieux dans les forêts de Bohême, notre offre vous emmène dans certains endroits les plus étonnantes sur notre planète.

alt-trans.source: In 80 days, you will see more of the world than most see through their entire lifetime!
alt-trans.target: En 80 jours, vous pourrez voir plus de monde que la plupart Voir à travers leur vie entière !

alt-trans.source: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet.
alt-trans.target: Des canyons de l'Arizona, aux temples khmers profondes dans la jungle, des plages tropicales du Queensland pour les glaciers de L'Antarctique, ou de la savane sauvage de l'Afrique de châteaux mystérieux dans les forêts de Bohême, notre offre vous emmène dans certaines les endroits les plus étonnants de la planète.
